Package com.force.sdk.jpa

Class Summary
BasicCRUDTest Smoke tests for basic JPA operations including logging.
BasicTransactionTest Tests for simple transactional behavior.
CallbackMethodTest Tests for callback methods on jpa entities.
CascadeCRUDTest Class for Cascade CRUD Tests.
ConstructorExpressionTest Tests related to JPQL constructor expression.
DatatypesBaseTest Tests for querying a basic entity with all datatypes.
DeleteBulkTest Tests for bulk delete.
DeleteDatatypesTest Tests for DELETE queries using all supported data types.
EmbeddedCRUDTest CRUD test for Embedded entities.
JPAMappingTest Tests for how salesforce entities are mapped to pojos.
JPATestUtils Util class used to intitialize TestEntities.
MaxFieldLengthExceptionTest Test for exceeding length limit of a string field.
MergeTest This class tests:- 1) merging with lazy and eager attributes, relationship.
NegativeCRUDTest Negative tests for JPA CRUD operations.
NegativeDetachPersistTest Testing the persistence of detached entities.
OptimisticTxTestMT Tests optimistic transaction support in JPA.
PersistenceContextLifetimeTest Tests for PersistenceContext lifetime in a not container managed scenario.
QueryGroupByDatatypesTest Test related to the GROUP BY clause in JPQL select statements.
QueryJoinTest Functional tests for JPA query joins.
SchemaLoadInvocationFTest One aspect of performance testing that counts certain method invocations during schema loading.
SchemaLoadInvocationFTest.PartnerConnectionWithLoginCounter Mock Force.com API connection which counts the number of API logins.
SchemaMetaDataTest This class tests @CustomObject and @CustomField features.
SerializedAttachTest Spec mentions serialized entities may become detached: "A detached entity results from ...
SpringBasicCRUDTest Basic Create/Read/Update/Delete test using Spring.
SpringCreateTest Tests around creating entities via JPA.
SubQueryTest Test for aggregate SOQL queries.
UpdateDatatypesTest Tests for UPDATE queries using all supported data types.
 

Enum Summary
OptimisticTxTestMT.Op Helper enum to model the execution protocol via an array.
